name: Data Breach
description: Sensitive customer data may be compromised.

name: Server Downtime
description: System outage may result in loss of business productivity.

name: Vendor Failure
description: Dependence on a single vendor may lead to service disruptions.

name: Regulatory Non-compliance
description: Failure to comply with regulations may result in penalties.

name: Cyber Attack
description: Malicious hackers may gain unauthorized access to the system.
